item.title: Karen add a quote by Susan Wiggs
item.description: "There can be no fooling ourselves into thinking this is something other than what it is—the willful ejection of Molly from our nest. It’s too late for second thoughts, anyway. She has to be moved into her dorm in time for freshman orientation. It’s been marked on the kitchen calendar for weeks—the expiration date on her childhood." -- Susan Wiggs

item.title: Karen add a quote by Patricia A. McKillip
item.description: "Imagination is the golden-eyed monster that never sleeps. It must be fed; it cannot be ignored." -- Patricia A. McKillip

item.title: Karen add a quote by Elizabeth Taylor
item.description: "The problem with people who have no vices is that generally you can be pretty sure they're going to have some pretty annoying virtues." -- Elizabeth Taylor
